short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab Chrome Extension displaying quotes with fantastic backgrounds to inspire you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open a new tab, see a beautiful nature background paired with a quote from a famous person to sooth and inspire your mind, all at the same time! 

[October 2024]
Updates:
1. Moved video backgrounds to external storage to make extension more lightweight
2. Added user input feature for users to add their own quotes into the their personal rotation

[August 2024]
It's first iteration only has 20 quotes with 3 backgrounds, but it does the trick and future versions will expand on this!
